section_title: Matters Relating to the Second Commitment Period
sentences: During the afternoon informal consultations, parties considered a draft CMP decision on amendments to the Kyoto Protocol.

The text compiled the various options proposed by parties on, inter alia : issues relating to the length of the commitment period; application of the amendments to the Kyoto Protocol; eligibility to participate in the flexibility mechanisms; and conclusion of the work of the AWG-KP.
